website_summaries.verdict: Whether you're looking for a new creative outlet or just want to share physical images with friends and family, Fujifilm's affordable Instax Mini 9 camera delivers.
cons: Shutter placement makes landscape shooting uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful present for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful present for my granddaughter. She was thrilled with this. She had this for her 8th birthday. I bought extra film but she was very careful and has taken some good shots.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, great little camera, get some cracking photos with it, lots of fun. Some of the pictures don't ways come out fantastic depending on the lighting (especially when your outside) but still works fine, often photos just arn't as clear as the ones taken inside. Point and shoot, easy to use, great quirky gift, good value for money, Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous little camera
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera for my daughter, just what she’s asked for. She’s going to love it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Abigale evans

customer_reviews.title: Not a big success
customer_reviews.text: This camera looks lovely but delivers very small poor quality pictures. It is not easy to use,it is mostly trial and error which is quite an expensive way to go about it! Bought as a birthday present but recipient soon lost interest and we haven’t even finished the film it came with! bought two spares as well which was a waste! Probably end up sticking it on eBay
customer_reviews.author: cherrypie

customer_reviews.title: Good fun for kids, but trial and error will occur, buy lots of film!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old daughters birthday. She loves it. But I must admit the camera is very sensitive to light so it really has to be on the right setting or the photos just don't develop. Be prepared for alot of wasted film, trail and error with this one. Still lots of fun though and good value for money I think.
customer_reviews.author: kee

customer_reviews.title: Photos are terrible quality / very dark / I feel I'm in 1980 / too slippery surface
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice but there are few issues : 1) surface is very slippery, so easy to drop - very easy to drop! 2) photos are terrible , very dark, quality is absolutely awful I regret this purchase. Nice advert, but this is worse than camera 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Coleta

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a first camera for my 9 year old granddaughter who is showing great interest in photography. As a photographer myself I am obviously all for encouraging this and I purchased this fun camera to help her get used to taking photos with a camera (she used an old mobile phone previously). She absolutely loves it and the fact she can get her photos instantly and watch them develop is great too. I would certainly recommend this product to anyone who has a similar aged child who is showing signs of interest in this creative hobby. They come in a great range of colours and its a great fun first step towards digital photography.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to really comment on picture quality, since they are not a patch on modern digital photographs. They are however a big improvement on old-style polaroid pictures. Best of all the camera is a lot of fun. I've got out of the habit of taking pictures, but this got a lot if use over christmas. Yes, the film is expensive, but the novelty of watching pictures develop in front of you never wears off. Great for selfies - single or group. Reminds me of the days of squeezing into the photo booths in Woolworths.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fab instant camera!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was over the moon with this for her birthday! The photos have a retro feel and as long as you don’t expect perfect picture quality you won’t be disappointed. She has loved taking pictures and being able to have them straight away! Easy to use and bought an accessories pack to go with it which had little picture frames, tinted lenses etc in, which added to the enjoyment even more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expected much more
customer_reviews.text: then the machine is perfect for beginners. for those who want to enter this world of Polaroid. because it has few functions, and a aiming and shooting machine and you must have good luck that light and distance are ok. they will throw lots of photos. because overexposed or even very dark. in short, I recommend it but only as a basis to begin to understand how to use machines like this.
customer_reviews.author: vixluna

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's birthday because she's wanted one for a long time. It's a nice easy to use camera but the pictures dont come out very well compared to the old original style we had growing up. Film is a little expensive to keep buying, but she loves it and that's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Great camera instant pictures
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Xmas gift for my 12 year old , easy to use camera once you put the film in just snap and the picture comes out immediately no need to shake it to dry , comes with 10 shots so only 10 pictures but bought the re full for £14 for an extra 20 shots would recommend . Lovely gift and pictures are there to display and keep straight away , recommend for younger teenagers .
customer_reviews.author: Nikkij78

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to get started with instant photography. It works well and the camera does its job. The quality of each image obviously is not as great as a digital camera, however, it depends if you want to make that sacrifice for an instant, physical picture.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik

customer_reviews.title: The gift that hit the spot
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11 year old as a gift- she was estatic & Absolutely loved it Took pixes .. all 40 shots in no time...she set it up and starting teaching all others ( she is the youngest by farrrrrr) how to make it work!! Only downside are the shots should really be much cheaper in this world of 100s of free digital prints ... it’s too dear
customer_reviews.author: renene

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy -Not a reliable point and shot camera
customer_reviews.text: Really difficult to get a good quality picture - our 11 daughter was given up with it now as pictures are just poor- update - we have now given up on this camera. The cost of the film, camera and poor results are all unacceptable. The manufacturer should be ashamed at releasing such a poor product
customer_reviews.author: Belle x

customer_reviews.title: Fab camera.
customer_reviews.text: Fab blast to the past. Give this a go you won't be disappointed. Lots of fun, but don't waste film as not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: cazzie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my best friends birthday! She loved the camera and the colour! The first few shots were a bit poor quality but I’ve read that can happen as it’s new and should improve as it’s used? Either way, good price and good delivery time!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Average snaps of course same as any instamax, but daughters love these, bought for Christmas and its introducing them to photography design lighting image structure and a host of artistic concepts while they're having fun. Eldest wants to be a professional photographer so inexpensive way to practice!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for instant photos
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my daughter for Christmas. She nearly 11yrs old. She was so pleased to receive this and found the camera easy to use. It’s a camera that is designed for a bit of rough and tumble. The quality of pictures are good. It’s so easy to change the film too. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but check the manual!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this camera for almost 10 months. Liked it a lot, of course had some faulty shoots but you need to get used to the camera and it’s settings, light and etc. After 10 months of use and hundreds of Polaroid’s the batteries died. Accidentally I did not notice that not every type of AA batteries fit. So I put wrong ones... I damaged not only new pack of Polaroid’s but also the whole camera... So just be careful and then the camera is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Vaiva

customer_reviews.title: Great gift but the film for it is very expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my wife's birthday last year and she loved it. The colours are gorgeous and she found it very easy to use and especially appreciated the little selfie mirror bit on the front. We have taken it on trips together and also used it as a guest book for a party too. The film is a bit pricey and honestly that is the only reason I wouldn't give it 5 stars is because the expense of the film puts her off using it more. The pictures come out nicely with that vintage feel to them and process quickly and the overall build quality of the camera is really impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great instant camera
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this with her birthday money. She loves it. Really easy to set up and my 10 year old daughter uses it to take photos with her friends. She loves that the photos come out instantly and she keeps them pinned to her wall. The photos come out well with good colour. She loves this camera
customer_reviews.author: Vicki T.

customer_reviews.title: Great, retro but expensive film
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and arrived ahead of time. Well made and so simple to use. If you follow the instructions the photos are OK with a nice retro feel, just obey basic photo rules like don't take photos directly in to bright lights. Just wish the film was cheaper as it's easy to get through loads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High tec
customer_reviews.text: This product was high-tec even though it is quiet easy to use for a child if you just watch a tutorial that will only take 5 to 10 minutes to assemble the camera. I recommend this to everyone because I guarantee you won't regret your chose of buy it. The colour is a beautiful blue colour that is light and effective it also comes with 10 shots which is quite beneficial and handy for you. This product has incouraged my children to love photography. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MAHDA SAEED

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Really good for those party events and nice to have a photo to put up rather than being on your phone. Really easy to use and there are accessories in the future which can be bought. Great gift for kids and adults
customer_reviews.author: PdeV

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Takes good photos and easy to use. Comes with battery's and one pack of film. Film is expensive like someone said its cheaper to buy film on eBay. Love the look of the camera got it in ice blue.
customer_reviews.author: louisareadsalot

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: A camera should not be this much fun. I love the vintage appearance of the photos, it's incredibly easy to use and set up. This is great for scrap booking, memories books, journaling and just about all other types of use, I have found a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ms j matthews

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to use camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera for cute scrapbook worthy pictures! I love film photography and this camera has been a lovely addition! It’s so easy to use even for those who have no photography experience... you can be very creative and playful with your pictures! Be wary that the most expensive part about this camera is the film so don’t get it because it’s cheap as if you wanna be taking a lot of playful pictures you will be spending a lot of money on the film.
customer_reviews.author: Mashal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it to capture every day, little moments. I like the quality of the pictures and just the camera in itself.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it but the cost of the film is ridiculous. The quality of the pictures is terrible, and at around 2" square are tiny. Save you're money it's just junk really
customer_reviews.author: mr s paterson

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: A lovely fun kids camera. However - 1) pictures poor quality. 2)The film is so expensive 3) works out about £1 per photo- can’t see it being used after film used up.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera at Xmas for my daughter she took one shot and then wanted to save for special occasions but it broke when she went to take another shot the other day! This was 5/6 mths after a purchase the item and this company was lovely enough to send me a brand new camera next day delivery free of charge! Thanks for you prompt decision 😊 brill camera and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my sister since she's into photography and I thought that Polaroid would be nice iconic addition to her little collection. Camera is easy to set up and takes lovely pictures. make sure you buy more shots as it it will be very hard not to take pictures one after another ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Maciek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo happy with this, takes gorgeous pics, i get the film with white borders as it looks vintage and i love that, its so easy to use this camera, practically works itself, forgot how fab it is to have instant pics, really wonderful and would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tia

customer_reviews.title: Quick pictures in a snap - Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for someone and I was very impressed with the picture quality of the pront. I thought with its smaller size it would be under par but I was very wrong! If your after quick pictures in a snap then this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H

customer_reviews.title: Worthless camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera fails to produce exposed pictures of acceptable quality. Despoite doing everything the manual details they are either extremely underexposed or extremely overexposed. It is a waste of money. Spend a bit more and go for something of better quality that works.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Quirky
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because pictures were coming out streaky. However this may havr been due to a faulty film and not the camera itself. Lovely colour and seemed quite durable. Not for the serious photographer but good for a bit of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great little retro camera, getting something you can hang up straight away is almost a novelty in itself this is a great gift for anyone young or old. It’s really easy to use , quick to produce the picture. The quality isn’t a digital standard but there’s a nice retro- ness to the quality Photos are small but that adds to the overall experience and they are perfect for a wallet sized snap
customer_reviews.author: Dearg

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is poor and way too small , my daughter wanted this .I dont see the point in this digital age
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Printing blank white photos.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working because it wasn't used for a few weeks. The pictures just came out white. I would suggest using up a film quite quickly, it obviously doesn't like to be left in a cupboard!
customer_reviews.author: ZoA

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolute waste of money picture quality is rubbish , films are overpriced my grandaughter is very disappointed and I wish I’d bought her a better camera for the price I expected better .
customer_reviews.author: carol lark

customer_reviews.title: Great product but a tad expensive because of the film it needs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, very easy to use and the kids love it! However, the price of it would be okay if you didn’t have to pay so much to print the pictures BUT the price of the films are crazy, even when they’re on offer. This lets the product down.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C. Mephan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - takes  amazing photos
customer_reviews.text: Great to give as a gift - my 12 year old daughter received it and she said that ittakes amazing pictures but you do need to use the different settings - it's super easy to use and travel with 🥰
customer_reviews.author: sangitap67

customer_reviews.title: Great fun camera
customer_reviews.text: Really great, wanted one for ages. Pictures print straight away, great quality, look vintage and cool. Refills are quite expensive but other than that it’s a great piece of kit!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Senior

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera it was a Christmas gift and I cannot get enough of it. It takes a few tries to get used to what setting to use depending on how much light is available.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter shes 12, she absolutely loves this, once shown how to operate it, she could do it herself. Pictures came out well, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Lovely camera, Easy to use, picture quality very good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking camera, a bit larger than I thought it was but easy to use and very good picture quality to film, comes with 10 photo film and lens to increase range. Also bought camera accessories package which comes with lots of things to increase fun taking photo's and lovely case to protect camera.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First shot comes out perfect, but every shot after that comes out black with white dots, i thought it was the first pack had been exposed to light or something but its happened again on a new pack, so out of 2 packs of 10 shots we have 2 pictures which are the first ones of each the rest are just coming out as nothing, i would like a replacement, or a full refund its ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Ahad-godber

customer_reviews.title: Good product...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but takes some practice getting the light right and lining the picture up. It is expensive when you price in the cartridges but they look lovely on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Quality of photos is rubbish and a few didn’t come out at all, it’s the worst camera ever used. Don’t waste your money just buy a photo printer and use an iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_owen57

customer_reviews.title: A definite must buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect camera. I bought it as a gift for my daughter she was impressed with it. Easy to use, film was easy to load and was taking photos instantly.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Fab camera
customer_reviews.text: Used this for our wedding guestbook photos. Everyone loved it and it provided great fun. Definitely recommend, super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: its really cute it takes some adorable pictures and also there's a variation of really cute colours
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Margaret A. Whitson

customer_reviews.title: Chunky,funky,cutesy and fun,fun,fun!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun thing to have and so cute.Its chunky and strong,is appealing to look at,comes in a range of beautiful colours so easy to use,I just wish I had better eyesight or the photos were a twitchy bit bigger,great for young eyes though.I would definitely recommend it,its a lovely nod to the past yet is funky and fun and contemporary. 50stars!!
customer_reviews.author: samantha rebecca evetts

customer_reviews.title: Flash fails to work
customer_reviews.text: Have gone through two of these cameras since Christmas and with both of them the flash was faulty. Therefore unusable in doors.
customer_reviews.author: hammer

customer_reviews.title: Very well loved and used. You
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my little sister, must admit I’m rather jealous I didn’t get it for myself. Her room is littered with these and who doesn’t love a print out photo of your special memory.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty always

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera 5*
customer_reviews.text: If you expect 4k ultra high definition picture quality then you do not want any type of polaroid camera, This cameras picture quality is excellent and gives each photo a retro style look which is what these cameras are designed to do. Works as it should, easy to use. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: No Shots Were Included
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted one of these for a long time but was waiting to find one for a good price, so I came across this camera which claims to come with 10 shots but when I opened the package, the box was battered that had the camera in it and to my surprise there was NO shots included like it was stated in the description. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters best Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter for Christmas, she loved it and was so happy says it's her best Christmas present ever, easy to use and picture quality excellent...
customer_reviews.author: yolande howes

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with the 10 films as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great first time instant camera at a great price. The only problem was the false advertisement for the 10 shots that come with the camera, since I did pay extra for them. All that was received was the camera. I would either like the money for the film refunded or the pack of film sent out ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Rhi

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Polaroid, it'll still be a short lived gimic though..
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to, takes small instant pictures, better than an old Polaroid, slightly cheaper packs too
customer_reviews.author: Stevio

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 year old niece and she absolutely loved it. Such a precious gift to capture precious memories. No issues so far and it has been months.
customer_reviews.author: I Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: You'll have great fun with this little camera. Decent quality little pictures, perfect for keeping those memories with family and friends that would usually just join the archives with the other 10,000 you've got stored on your phone/camera/pc! Ideal gift for your children.
customer_reviews.author: The Wardian

customer_reviews.title: Great retro camera, quality build for good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality build, despite plastic. More impressed than I thought I would be. Feels durable, not that heavy, very easy to set-up, and extremely easy to use. (From someone with zero camera experience, so feel comfortable buying this if it is for older kids)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Thorpe

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera got so many shots already online thing is the films are a little pricey but hey it’s worth it in my eyes for the fun little memories you get to keep
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing innovative fun
customer_reviews.text: Get plenty of film.. excellent for children and those who aren’t keen on other modern gadgets. Very simple to operate. Put film in, take photo, and photo is printed there and then! Easy
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived broken and the second worked but you don't get many photos for the cost and the quality is bad. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap profuct
customer_reviews.text: Won’t buy this again only a year old used once, now not working.
customer_reviews.author: Nichola

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loved it
customer_reviews.text: Used for a trip to Disney so I got about 100 shots with it and the girlfriend loved it, its now been gathering dust in a draw for months lol
customer_reviews.author: Derek Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Very easy to use. Gives a much better quality picture than I expected. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Morse

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for my 10 year old. I baught the set to go with it too, which means she can try all different camera features and display her pictures however she'd like. Excellent for a budding little but not so little photographer. I may also borrow this on occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fairly simple to use and cute photos print out quickly. Bit bigger than expected but lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy build quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Film door broke on Boxing day, very flimsy plastic latch, unfixable. Total waste of money and daughter devastated.
customer_reviews.author: BabyPeach

customer_reviews.title: Daughters 8th birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters 8th birthday. She is absolutely over the moon with it. Very easy to set up and simple to use and understand. Bought the case with it aswell which is made very well and looks the part. Very retro feel to the pictures which is nice and the quality of them are fantastic for what it will be used for.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. J. McLean

customer_reviews.title: Polaroid relived
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift for my kids giving them the joy of photography without the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Junaid

customer_reviews.title: Authenticity
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 12 years old daughter. She loves it. Very cute. Takes pics nicely. Surprised with quality photo it takes. In this digital world nice to have it because when you take pics on phones and digital cameras you don’t really print them all out. So it’s nice to have instant pleasure to hold actual picture and hang them.
customer_reviews.author: bayarsaikhan

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable or economical product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she is really struggling to get any sort of image out of this camera - often over exposed even using the settings on the lens. Unhelpfully the flash fires every time you take a shot. At the price of the film - this is not an economical product
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Goodison

customer_reviews.title: Fun Camera
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this camera. It takes good small snaps. She has bought herself accessories for it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M J B

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera for our school projects, the kids love it. However, sometimes the picture is printed on an angle while it was in the middle when I took it...
customer_reviews.author: innocence

customer_reviews.title: decent camera
customer_reviews.text: a decent camera, the only downside of this to me the that it only supply 10 films, dont mind charging a little bit more for extra film but buying them separatly is a hassle
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a Christmas present, as expected they loved it, very simple to set up and get going with it. The camera produces very nice photos, however the only downside to this camera is that the packs of photo paper are rather expensive but a great product nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for family use. Love the colour and quality of the camera which is easy to use. For great pictures, make sure you take pictures with enough light in the room or wherever you are. Definitely would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: S Chadha

customer_reviews.title: 🤩
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for one of my friends and she absolutely loves it. She used the 10 shots from the moment she received it. The quality is so much better than I would expect. Overall, in my opinion, it’s a good camera and worth its price.
customer_reviews.author: Ciobotaru Andreea

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter was very very happy with her birthday gift. Great memories made.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, my daughter lives it but doesn't use it as much as she wants to because the film is very expensive to replace.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: This camera is ....
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this product and would definitely recommend if you are a beginner in photography. However if you are looking for a professional camera I don not think this is the camera for you. I ordered this for my daughter and she loves it. Overall an amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Breda Mc Cart

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do what is says on the tin....at least 70% of photos did not develope, just black with white dots. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: mrss

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality. Easy to use an good fun for my Granddaughter to use with her friends
customer_reviews.author: Doffy

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 9 year old to take on holidays to take pics and add to journal straight away. Very easy to use.. pictures are of good quality and good size. She loves it and can use it easily.
customer_reviews.author: AsmaTI

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods from receipt.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, when my daughter opened the camera on Xmas day, the back of the films was case was already off and therefore all photos went black. We bought additional photo films on Boxing Day and these ended up going completely white. I therefore had to return the goods as this camera was unusable. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Granddaughter loved taking pictures of the family and seeing then straight away.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Todner

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant little camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our wedding gift book and we wasn’t disappointed! Everyone loved taking snaps and the Polaroid shots have quite a charm to them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter for Christmas. She was delighted with it.

customer_reviews.title: The fun, but expensive camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is robust, well built and easy to use. The film, however, is expensive for what it is and would render the camera expensive to use regularly.

product_meta.title: instax Mini 9 Camera with 10 Shots - Ice Blue
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Ice Blue| Style Name:Camera with 10 ShotsShake up your life with the instax mini 9 - a compact instant camera with a cute and iconic design. Including a selfie mirror and close-up lens, this camera is just screaming out for that perfect selfie. Brand new features, like the high-key mode for brighter photos and the automatic exposure measurement for aperture settings, means you'll be able to show off your creativity in an instant. The instax mini 9 is super easy to use, and compatible with instax mini film for instant credit card-sized prints - your perfect accessory for capturing one-off moments at parties, festivals and fun days out.

BOX CONTAINS
instax mini 9 camera - Ice Blue, Hand Strap, Close-up Lens Attachment, Sticker, AA Batteries x2, Instruction Manual, 1 x 10 shot mini film pack
feature_bullets: Produce instant credit card size photos
Built in flash & automatic exposure control
Inclusive Selfie Mirror, plus Close-up Lens attachment
Uses Instax Mini Film, print size 54 (w) x 86 (H)mm, image size 46 (w) x 62 (H)mm
instax mini 9 camera - Ice Blue, Hand Strap, Close-up Lens Attachment, Sticker, AA Batteries x2, Instruction Manual, 1 x 10 shot mini film pack
Exposure Control is Manual switching system (Light Emitting Diode indicator in exposure meter)
